description:
If you do a lot of copying & pasting of text, you know that sometimes they override each other. With Clipboard, every text you copy is stored in a 'clipboard' for you to access later on.

Basically, when you copy a text, you switch to the clipboard app or tap the dashboard icon, and your copied text is stored to be used later on. You have several sharing options like emailing, sending to Notes, opening in Google Maps, Neato-ing etc.
See Demo Video

NEW IN VERSION 3.0.0: 
• Added Compatibility for all webOS versions
